definition: to break even/to get one's money's worth
enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: I'm just wearing this coat out so that I can have a new one sooner.
sentences.chinese: 我正儘快把這件舊上衣穿夠本，以便早一點換件新的。

sentences.english: The price just covers the cost.
